description: Twake - The Open Digital Workplace; Twake is a secure open source collaboration platform to improve organizational productivity.

installer.script: Expand-MSIArchive "$dir\Setup_Twake_lastest.msi" "$dir"; robocopy /MOVE /NJH /NJS /NFL /NDL /S /E "$dir\twake" "$dir\..\$version"; $null = mkdir -Force "$persist_dir\data"; if (Test-Path -Path "$scoopdir\..\AppData\Roaming\Twake") {$null = New-Item -ItemType Junction -Path "$scoopdir\..\AppData\Roaming\Twake" -Target "$persist_dir\data"}
